thread.title: CHGT’s 3D Printing Portal Launch a Resounding Success
thread.title_full: CHGT’s 3D Printing Portal Launch a Resounding Success

author: admin
title: CHGT’s 3D Printing Portal Launch a Resounding Success
text:
Changing Technologies, Inc. 
HOUSTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Changing Technologies, Inc. (OTCBB:CHGT) has opened its revolutionary online 3D printing portal ( 6d3d.com ) and reports that the much-anticipated launch was not only a complete success, but that initial traffic has greatly surpassed projections. 
“We’ve been delighted, but not surprised, at the traffic generated to date,” said CGHT CEO Marco Valenzuela. “The 3D printing community’s positive reception of the concept indicated the launch would be met with great enthusiasm. The market’s ready for an easy-to-access portal that can provide users of all skill levels a way to make their 3D creations come to life. With this success, we’re confident the portal will lead to enhanced revenues and generate additional business opportunities .” 
CHGT’s game-changing 3D printing portal is now delivering on its promise of changing how content designers, creators and printers interact. 
With its successful launch, content makers have complete access to a wide range of prototyping and fabrication resources. The innovative portal can be used to produce artwork, mechanical parts, jewelry or almost any other 3D content the user can conceive. Users will be given a custom URL they can utilize to sell their creations to the online community. 
Industry analysts are predicting the global 3D printing market will surge to $13.4 billion by 2018 and could top $21 billion by 2020 . 
For more information on CHGT, please visit www.changingtechno.com . 
For more information on 6 th Dimension Technologies, please visit http://www.6d3d.com . 
About Changing Technologies, Inc. 
Changing Technologies, Inc. (CHGT) is an emerging technology company focused on developing innovative concepts to bring to consumers. It recently created a new subsidiary — 6 th Dimension Technologies — to pursue additional growth areas and market needs in the booming 3D printing sector. A forward-thinking company working to be at the forefront of the next generation of consumer-based technology, CHGT is positioning itself to leverage global demand for the latest technological advances and services the company offers. Changing Technologies, Inc. is in the cutting-edge technology sphere alongside companies like Voxelijet AG ( VJET ), Arcam AB ( AMAVF ), and ExOne Co. ( XONE ).
